mapper.select: SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMON_SEQ, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, COMMON_TITLE, COMMON_CONTENT, COMMON_HIT, COMMON_DEL_FLAG, IN_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(UP_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') IN_DATE FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMON_SEQ = '8'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMON_SEQ, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, COMMON_TITLE, COMMON_CONTENT, COMMON_HIT, COMMON_DEL_FLAG, IN_USER_ID, IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, UP_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY)+1, '8', null, #{files}, #{title}, #{contents}, '0', 'N', #{memberId}, SYSDATE, #{memberId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMON_SEQ, COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, COMMON_TITLE, COMMON_CONTENT, COMMON_HIT, COMMON_DEL_FLAG, IN_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(UP_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') UP_DATE FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET FILE_SEQ = #{files}, COMMON_TITLE = #{title}, COMMON_CONTENT = #{contents}, UP_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
